entries.abort: We are at the mercy of our enemies out here. Why are you leaving?
entries.angry_disable: What! What have you done? We will not fall so easily.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for jump location. Once we have the location, proceed to that area, engage, and disable the transport.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have a lock. Sending the location to your nav computer. Capture that shuttle and return it to headquarters.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters detected.> pcontrast3
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters eliminated.> pcontrast3
entries.capture_complete: The transport is back in Imperial control. Escort it back to headquarters.
entries.capture_phase_1: We have taken back control of the transport from the Bothans. Attempting to get engines back online.
entries.capture_phase_2: We almost have it. We should be under way shortly.
entries.complete: The transport is safely in Imperial hands.
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy escort fighters eliminated.>
entries.failed_destroy: We wanted that transport back in one piece. Report your failure to your superior immediately.
entries.failed_escape: You let the Bothans escape with our transport! Report you disgrace to your superior.
entries.panic_1: It looks like the Bothan spies had some help.
entries.panic_2: The Bothans had some support vessels in the area.
entries.panic_3: I knew it! The Bothans must have been working for the Rebels.
entries.panic_4: Rebels! The Bothans and them have to be working together.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the transport's engines so that it may be recovered.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow and protect the transport on it's way back to Imperial space.
entries.quest_location_d: The next transport is still in the Endor system. Intercept it before it is able to leave the system.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the engines are offline, move in close, and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.recovery_success: Nice work, pilot. Most of the transports made it back to Imperial space.
entries.split_quest_alert: The satellites that were destroyed need to be replaced immediately. Meet up with a supply freighter and deliver the satellites to the field engineers.
entries.target_disabled: The transport's engines are offline. Quickly start the docking procedure.
entries.taunt_1: You may have won last time but this time will be different.
entries.taunt_2: I feel sorry for you...wait, no I don't! Die!
entries.taunt_4: Ignore the Imperial fighter! It is the transport that is important.
entries.taunt_5: Don't let the transport get away.
entries.thanks_1: Good work, pilot. The Rebels will think twice about attacking again.
entries.thanks_2: It looks like the Bothans' friend were not up to the challenge.
entries.thanks_4: The Bothan dogs and their allies are no match for the might of the Empire.
entries.thanks_5: Keep a close eye out. I am sure there are more out there.
entries.title: Endor System: Recover Another Stolen Engineer Transport
entries.title_d: The Bothan's have attacked and captured several engineer's transports. We must get as many of them back as we can. Each one contains important information about the project. Capture and return another transport to Imperial control.
